content:
You find Raemon near his hoversled with a checklist in hand, taking inventory of his goods. He smiles and waves jovially as he spots you in his periphery. "Well, if it isn't my old friend!" To your delight, he seems more well-rested and refreshed than when you last saw him.

Add 4 supplies to Raemon.

Clear Raemon with   to learn how the supply runs are going.
